steps.title: Your First Customer
steps.text: Check today’s order board and accept an order.

steps.title: Stock the Pantry
steps.text: Buy wheat noodles & soy broth from the market.
steps.tip: Try: /noodle buy → hit **enter** to buy multiple items.

steps.title: Forage Fresh Ingredients
steps.text: Forage for fresh scallions to get cooking.

steps.title: Cook the Order
steps.text: Cook Classic Soy Ramen as your customer requested.

steps.title: Serve & Earn
steps.text: Serve your accepted order to earn coins, SXP, and REP.
